pullrequest.title: [A-2] Add  gpu ray sensor to ign-gazebo

content.raw:
the ubuntu build linked in the build status for 727f525 failed due to a disk space problem on the build machine, but I built a new one that is clean:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64&build=268)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/268/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64/268/
